doc:
Louis Herthum https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Herthum 0 Louis Herthum (born July 5, 1956) is an American actor and producer. Herthum has worked as a stage, television, and film actor, and he has also appeared in national television commercials. He is best known for his recurring role as Dep. Andy Broom, the young sheriff of Jessica Fletcher (played by Angela Lansbury) on Murder, She Wrote and Peter Abernathy in the HBO television series Westworld. Louis_Herthum ( born July_5_,_1956 ) is an_American_actor_and_producer . Herthum has_worked as a_stage , television , and film_actor , and he has_also_appeared in national_television_commercials . Andy_Broom , the_young_sheriff of Jessica_Fletcher (_played by Angela_Lansbury_) on Murder , She Wrote and Peter_Abernathy in the_HBO_television_series_Westworld .
